se.miun.itm.input

Class InPUTConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.miun.itm.input.InPUTConfig

  • public abstract class InPUTConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    A static meta service that is initiated each time InPUT starts. InPUT itself is used for its configuration, which is why it, at startup, requires to read the InPUT configuration files in this folder. The InPUT properties can either be retrieved by calling the methods below, or by direct access through the scope of any design or experiment.
    Author:
    Felix Dobslaw
